content: are you wanting a quick and simple crop top check this one out simple construction allows you to alter the length and decide just how much crop you want while fitting loose and free for summer vibes written as xs to 3x testers used various yarns between dk and light worsted often in some sort of natural fiber anything in the cotton or bamboo realm leads to a lightweight top that will be perfect for the beach or a summer shopping day if you re using comfy cotton blend the written sizes should all be possible with 2 to 4 cakes making this an affordable option for a cute top yardage will vary with different yarns tensions and modifications to the pattern
